name: inoffensively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not offensive and does not cause any harm : This movie is hardly original, but it is inoffensively likeable. The room was spacious and inoffensively decorated.
More examplesFewer examplesWe tried to be good neighbours and lived as inoffensively as possible.The hotel is decorated in an inoffensively neutral colour scheme.We stood around the barbecue and chatted inoffensively about cars and decorating.She was living in some inoffensively ordinary town on the coast.
